overview:
Divio, a web agency located in Zürich, builds web applications and is specialised in the areas of design and development.

For the production Divio uses the modern Webframework Django and is the main contributor to the successful open source projects django CMS and django SHOP.

django CMS is one of the most popular Python-based content management systems. It’s translated in over 30 languages, has over 2200 followers on twitter and is one of the most forked and watched Python-projects on GitHub. It has been downloaded over 100’000 times and has over 100’000 unique visitors per year on its project website (http://www.django-cms.org).

The CMS is completely plugin-based which allows the content managers to easily create highly customizable websites. Plugins can be written in plain Django which makes it developer-friendly.

Its ability to add Python and Django apps easily makes it also suitable for enterprises. The easy-to-use frontend editing of websites brings down costs of training.

To provide our existing clients more cost-effective services and to further expand our customer and user base we will introduce new services and products over the next months:

django CMS 3: The next version of django CMS will add plugins-in-plugins functionality, an easy-to-use publishing service and new plugins to further reduce the development speed and improve the ease-of-use of the system.

django CMS cloud: Setup, manage and maintain new django CMS instances, apps and services with point and click in a browser.

django CMS add-ons market: Promote, download or directly install apps to your cloud instance.

django CMS plug&play apps: Specific apps that are ready to use for your project without developer knowledge. One of the first apps will be the django SHOP plug&play.

django CMS gigs: Offer your django CMS skills or ask for specific skills in the gigs section.

Enterprise services: For enterprises we offer consulting services and specific services like private clouds.

More information will be available here: http://preview.django-cms.org
